list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clean (an area) by brushing away dirt or litter.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a large black car swept past the open windows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một chiếc xe lớn màu đen quét qua các cửa sổ đang mở

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the detective swept the room for hair and fingerprints
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thám tử quét phòng cho tóc và dấu vân tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of sweeping something with a brush.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was giving the floor a quick sweep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã cho sàn quét nhanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a grandiose sweep of his hand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cú cuốn cây hùng vĩ của bàn tay của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a procedure for inducing labor in a pregnant woman, in which a medical practitioner moves a finger around within the opening of the cervix to detach the amniotic membranes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I went in for a sweep at 41 weeks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi vào để quét lúc 41 tuần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a comprehensive search or survey of a place or area.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the police finished their sweep through the woods
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đã hoàn thành quét qua rừng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, typically curved stretch of road, river, or land.
a long, heavy oar used to row a barge or other vessel.
a long pole mounted as a lever for raising buckets from a well.
